text: Agent Events The Kafka real-time collection agent has two agent events: Event Description Event Description Assigned The event is emitted the first time a workflow is started, followed by the partition/partitions it is assigned. Rebalance The event is emitted when a workflow is rebalanced, followed by the partition/partitions it is assigned. Note! Stand-by workflows do not emit any events. A stand-by workflow is a workflow that does not have any partitions assigned, which happens when there are no more available partitions. Debug Events
title: Kafka Real-Time Collection Events - MediationZone Documentation 9.3 - InfoZone
